Petal | New York, NY | Software engineers | Full-time | Onsite

Petal is a credit card accessible to people without a credit history, by using machine learning to analyze someone's cash flow instead of the traditional credit score-based model. Our aim is to serve the 65 million people in the U.S. (primarily immigrants, millennials, and minorities) without a credit history.

https://jobs.lever.co/petalcard
